website_summaries.verdict: A highly functional alternative to the traditional picnic basket boasting a large, fully insulated interior and many accessories. An exceptional value.
pros: Large dimensions work well for groups
Includes plates, wine glasses, flatware, salt/pepper shakers, wine opener, and reusable cotton napkins for four
Excellent temperature maintenance makes it perfect for camping, hiking, or the beach
cons: Plastic glasses can become scratched over time

customer_reviews.title: Construction and functionality of this basket deserves 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: We will be using our picnic basket this week as we travel in the central Virginia area. While we've yet to use it, we're very impressed with how well constructed it is and all the extra features that most baskets don't come with. It's impressive how you're willing to donate to such a worthy cause. Kuddo's to you as we've had cancer touch our family, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: it was amazing, I was able to pack a cold pasta ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually rushed this for Sunday boat ride, it was amazing, I was able to pack a cold pasta and fruits and everything fit, I put everything in the dishwasher which I wasn't sure if they were dishwasher safe but they made it thru fine. Got a lot of oh's and ah's for bringing something so 5 STAR!! Would recommend and buy it again once its worn out
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Super Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with my picnic tote!! It's put together well & the utensils are very nice! We'll be getting plenty of good use out of this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SogySeal

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Time!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a "Pro-picnicker". Everything you need and ample room for hot and cold goodies to lay out a fine spread for 2-4 people! Awesome for the beach, concert or any outdoor event. Thoughtful design employs lightweight components that make it easy to carry. Great price and problem-free fulfillment! Thanks Scuddles!
customer_reviews.author: Burbanked

customer_reviews.title: This is the PERFECT gift when you don't know what to get
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT gift when you don't know what to get! The neutral color of the heavy-duty tote is perfect; the accessories compliment the bag; it has everything you would need for a great double-date; just bring the food & wine! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna G

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST bang for buck picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST bang for buck picnic basket! I searched Amazon for hours to find the perfect basket. I was looking at wicker, but decided being insulated was worth giving up the traditional wicker for the insulated baskets. Not only is this basket of incredible quality Kama it was the most reasonably-priced I found. It is the only one I found that had extras like a salt pepper shaker, a cheese cutting board, and cloth napkins! The advertisement says it is a 4 people basket, but I think this is large enough to pack a week's worth of food in!! Plenty of room! Well made. Easy to carry. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be everything described......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a wedding gift. My standard is a picnic basket, but while the traditional wicker/wood ones are charming, this was more functional for an active young couple. I can't evaluate it by use, but upon examination it seemed to be a quality piece. The service ware was attractive and seemed sturdy enough for a picnic, and the "storage" space was adequate for a bottle of wine and a good amount of food. It was attractive and I would honestly welcome it as a gift to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Mare

customer_reviews.title: Ice lasted over 14 hours in cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect purchase! I am so happy I bought it. We went on a weekend trip. Filled the ice cooler around 9 am at the hotel and it lasted until 11 pm! Yes, we drained it a bit but 50% of the ice was still solid. So surprised! Definitely worth it for the money just for that part! The plates and accessories are a bonus. Even comes with a small cutting board. Great quality for outdoors. Extremely happy with this purchase. 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picnic cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the picnic basket is a very good product. It is Well constructed and looks very sturdy and I know it will last a long time. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because I think it would benefit from a hard plastic inner lining for the food section. The basket collapses a bit and the food gets tossed around.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment for camping or picnic
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag to Mt San Jacinto Stone Creek campground recently. It was able to fit six 1L (33.8) water bottles and six 500mL (16.9oz) Gatorade bottles. I froze 4 water bottles instead of using ice and staggered the drinks so they were surrounded by ice evenly. This bag kept everything cold for the 2 days I was there and still had 1/3 ice left in the water bottles. Well insulated and could for sure keep drinks cold as fridge temp for at least 3 days. The utensils cut our 0.5in meats without prob. It’s lightweight and so portable. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Oblivious Souk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picnic bag!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooo glad I ordered this bag! It worked perfectly for everything we took to movies in the cemetery. It's sturdy, and I love that it has everything that I need especially the little cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: Elyssa A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the quality of the items included. The items that are provided inside are cheap and are more likely to break. For the money, additional focus could have been spent on the quality of products included in the picnic basket.
customer_reviews.author: Brent W.

customer_reviews.title: no tags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding shower gift. I was disappointed that it didn't have any tags on it. everything it was advertised to be was not written anywhere. I hoped they didn't think it was just something I had and didn't want. But, other than that, It was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma knows best !!

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Picnic/But still great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it accept the fabric was ripped in the middle. Looks like a sharp object had cut the fabric. I will keep it. Everything else is fine. This coming Sunday I will use for the First Time. San Francisco Symphony playing in the park for free. My bag, chair and blanket, good book and music, what more in life can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Loughrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, great for outdoor concerts
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size picnic cooler with nice ammenities. The only thing that was problematic was the ice leaked and got the bottom of the bag wet (along with the napkins and fabric on the bottom part of the bag.) I suppose we could not pour the ice directly into the bag and put it in a ziplock bag to keep it from leaking. Otherwise, great bag, really liked the cute little wine glassess and utencils!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a picnic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Scuddles picnic basket for Diner en Blanc. It was perfect. I was able to securely pack my dinnerware in the front and my cold food items on the insulated side. The insulated side is deep enough to hold 1L bottle of water. After unpacking, I could collapse the bag and store it out of sight. Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Somewhereintx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach and all that you need.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this will be sturdy for the beach and comes with all the plates, salt and pepper shaker, curing board. It is spacious and think it will be perfect. Returned the expensive wicker one and got this way better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... picnic bag to a winery and had a very beautiful picnic. It keeps out cheese and wine cold ...
customer_reviews.text: We took the picnic bag to a winery and had a very beautiful picnic. It keeps out cheese and wine cold with a few ice packs. We did need to add ice after 2 hours which I thought was a little fast. After adding ice we had to be very careful with the zipper as we thought we had closed the zipper and it was slightly open and leaked water. User error but I do give the zipper 10% credit for sticking at the end. \r\n\r\nOther than that minor issue we both loved the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take to Hollywood Bowl, cannot say how surprised and pleased I was by the high quality of this product for the price. There is plenty of room for a picnic for four I would highly recommend as a gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: c rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for carrying to outdoor concerts, picnics, or other events. The interior is extremely spacious, with room for ice packs, food containers, beverages, etc. The plates are a good size and we love the cloth napkins. In addition to being glad I purchased this picnic tote, I would give this as a gift! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Stewart, B.S., M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: Am returning this. Sent in box with lid of basket open and pushed down inside the body. Tried to zip lid on. It is impossible because the lid is too large for bottom. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was look. I grew up camping with my parents and Mom had a picnic basket. In later years so did I. But I now live in an apartment with limited space This is perfect for day trips or for overnight stays where buffet breakfasts are on hold and many times takeout is your only option. Plenty of room and plates and metal flatware for your meal. Plus room for extra snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is amazing! It DOES keep things cold
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! It DOES keep things cold. We were out for 11 hours (that includes travel time) and when I unpacked the items were STILL cold. I also like the weight of the bag. I was going to get an old fashion wicker basket. So very glad I did not do so.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: A great find
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time with no issues. My husband loves the color of and big Plus is that the dishes came with it. Can't wait to use this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use the basket for picnics and vacations. It is a complete life saver. It's large enough to hold a wine bottle fresh fruit and sandwiches. The dishes are durable and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Iradesa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cooler/picnic basket!! My husband and I take a lot of weekend getaways, and this is perfect for that. We can throw our favorite snacks and drinks and we are good to go. No more worrying about having a fork or plate when we order delivery! We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ledford

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing. Everything has lasted so well and they're easily ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so legit. My girlfriend and I hit up the beach every weekend and we fill this thing up with food and drinks. It's amazing. Everything has lasted so well and they're easily cleaned and put back into storage.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a day at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. Not sure how long it will keep ice, however everything stays cold during a day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: W. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully  Constructed
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived today. i love the constuction and the material. It is larger than I expecte. It appears to be able to last and it will work great for our day at the beach and a surprise romantic picnic with my wife this weekend. I can not tell you about the warmth or cold efficiacy until after I USE IT BUT IT APPEARS TO BE LEAK PROF AS WELL. I RATE THIS A 4 1/2 UNTIL I have more use and wear.
customer_reviews.author: P c.

customer_reviews.title: I just received my picnic basket and just love it. We plan to use the basket at ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my picnic basket and just love it. We plan to use the basket at our outdoor symphony venue all season long and gave it a test run on Friday. It's attractive, sturdy, very roomy and of quality construction. It was easy to carry. Big enough to carry all my stuff and yet small enough to fit under my plastic outdoor patio chair at the symphony. I love how easy it is to wipe out and keep clean. ALL items inside are of very good quality. This EXCEEDED my expectations. How often do you get to say that? I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome choice!
customer_reviews.text: Omg. I love this bag!! Its perfect for any picnic! Plenty of space in the bag and it has everything you need except the food! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Khi.

customer_reviews.title: I love picnics and outdoor concerts and I bought this for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love picnics and outdoor concerts and I bought this for a friend's wedding present. They're grown ups and they are now merging 2 households into 1. So I thought who needs another blender. If I love outdoor concerts and picnics they probably do to and what a lovely gift. The quality is wonderful and so is the price!!! I added a bottle of wine to the basket and I think it's such a lovely gift! If I didn't already have a backpack of my own, I'd buy one for myself too. Good quality, plenty of room and a great gift in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stein

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little picnic basket. The cutlery is a little flimsy, but the plates are durable plastic. The amount of space that the cooler can hold is incredible! Taking this picnic basket camping this weekend. Able to hold two days worth of food easily. All you’re missing for the perfect picnic is to grab a picnic blanket and your set!
customer_reviews.author: Chickabee

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, roomy comfortable picnic bag for two
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, roomy comfortable picnic bag for two. Large, nice size area for packing/storing food! Love all of the well made and complete accessories as well. Perfection! The price is very fair for what I have received! Happy Picnicing!!!
customer_reviews.author: heavenly cane

customer_reviews.title: Ready to head outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Well made and the cooler section can hold a bottle of wine standing upright. Getting ready to take it out for a picnic but this will become our new family car camping kitchen. Love the quality of the dishes and the all the room of the cooler. Material quality seems sturdy enough to hold up to the abuse of being used outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: CX2clayton

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: What a great product!!! Could not be happier. The quality is very good and the fact that you have all of the utensils and supplies needed for a great picnic makes this product very worthwhile and very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect size and very well made and organized for hot ...
customer_reviews.text: This pack was purchased as a wedding gift for a family memeber that picnics and goes on road trips often. It is a perfect size and very well made and organized for hot and cold items. Loved this. Everythings right there for perfect on the go.
customer_reviews.author: BNorth

customer_reviews.title: Compact and fully stocked
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a picnic basket for our boat. This is perfect for what we need, fits into limited space but still has all the essentials. A good alternative to the standard wicker picnic basket.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Great quality, stylish and practical. Went on an outdoor picnic and it was so convenient to have all utensils in this compact piece. The food storage area is large and i was able to fit all the food i needed. i had to contact customer service and the response was so gracious and generous that i am a devoted customer. Will most effeminately choose Scuddles again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for people who travel in their car frequently
customer_reviews.text: You can keep food cold and it has cutting board and can eat stuff that is good for you while you are traveling down the road
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blanchat

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the picnic basket but my only complaint is that ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the picnic basket but my only complaint is that the plastic cups scratch very very easily... other than that it's great and is nice
customer_reviews.author: J Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift for my best friend for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my best friend for Christmas...I did peak at the inside and all I have to say is that I am going to be the BEST friend EVER! :) all the items were normal size for a family of four! She is a soccer mom so this will be perfect for her, her husband and two little ones :) thank you! Price was a great amount considering other vendors on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Selena L

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, purchased 2 for xmas gifts, they were a big hit! Very nice, good quality and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Donnamarie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Size
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten a chance to use this magnificent piece but I most definitely will. I love how much space it has even with the dishes in it. I love the dishes that came along with it. My Fiance' (man) loves it as well as the colors and the straps. This is an excellent idea for any type of weather. I'm so happy I purchased this. Thanks again ..
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this as a gift. I have had ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. I have had one for several years and have used it for cross country travel, the beach, and local picnics. I hand wash the utensils and they have stood up well. Im excited to give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this picnic basket as a donation for a Boy Scout raffle. It is very well made, has lots of storage space, plates and utensils for a family of 4, and definitely a great buy. It can be used for picnics, the beach, as well as road trips. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dee shop

customer_reviews.title: Very handy picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: This is really great, it holds a lot and comes with everything you need for a picnic with 4 people. The storage and organization is well designed. Overall we are very pleased with this picnic basket.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift to give someone, it has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. F.

customer_reviews.title: One inclusive basket
customer_reviews.text: We like to take this “basket” to tour and visit vineyards in Virginia. A complete basket with all you need in a compact, quality design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my MIL who loved it!! They go boating a lot in the Spring/Summer and this tote/cooler keeps all of the picnic essentials in one convenient spot.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic basket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this picnic basket! It has lots of room and I like all of the accessories
customer_reviews.author: julia piper

customer_reviews.title: but it looks to be an excellent product. If I get any feedback from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift, but it looks to be an excellent product. If I get any feedback from the recipient I will be sure to let you know.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket. Comes with everything you need.You can also store plenty in this basket. I definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel and tidiness
customer_reviews.text: Was able to take my wife on a surprise pic-nic by the bay. Thanks to our new pic-nic basket it help get me brownie points in the romance field of our relationship. Looking forward to using it more often.
customer_reviews.author: patrick brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for yourself or for someone else!! well recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful, great material and fully loaded for a picnic or gettaway with kids or significant other. It is a beautiful and handy gift ot what I did, that I kept it for myself cause I loved it so much. The cooler seccion is larger than what I expected it!..
customer_reviews.author: Ileana Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great - very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picnic bag! Includes all I need for a day in the outdoors or for a picnic with friends!! Very nice quality and decent-looking finish of the bag and the inner compartment is surprisingly spacious. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picnic on the pontoon boat!!
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking and sturdy, this is a nice soft sided cooler for food and drinks, plus a side zippered section for plates and utensils. I would say it is medium sized with plenty of room in the cooler for meal items for 2-4 people. The plates and other utensils are smaller sized and just right for a picnic. We plan take this out on our boat to have a picnic on the lake!!
customer_reviews.author: Karin  E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It is much larger than what it seems in the pictures! The materials are of good quality. I still haven't used it for a picnic but I can see that it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picnic tote...
customer_reviews.text: Love my picnic tote!! I highly recommend...perfect to keep food cool. It's perfect how compact it is yet it can hold quite a bit.

customer_reviews.title: The best picnic bag for a family
customer_reviews.text: The best picnic bag for a family. Roomy cooler area and the utensils are wonderful to have packed neatly in there. So far no rips or tears and we've used it about 4 times...
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: ... product arrived on time and it was in a nice packaging. The silver wares are made or stainless ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and it was in a nice packaging. The silver wares are made or stainless with nice plastic handles. The plates are of good quality plastic too. Half of the bag is insulated so it's perfect for picnic anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Fe

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone witht he tiem asked where they got it from ordered it and very happy with it.

customer_reviews.title: As much as I love the idea of a traditional picnic basket
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love the idea of a traditional picnic basket, I chose practicality and am so happy I did. This tote is bigger inside than I anticipated so it easily holds everything for a picnic...including the wine. It’s nice to be able to go to the beach or mountains with one tote that keeps food cold and has all the supplies needed. It also feels sturdy and looks nice.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Bought it as gift for friend. Very good quality

customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet. It looks great and seems really good quality. The plates are a little small. I’m looking forward to using this.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As pictured and carries more than expected! Perfect for traveling as well!

customer_reviews.text: In the Arizona Desert it’s off-road riding in the winter & boating on the Colorado River in the summer...this picnic basket is perfect for riding in the desert and boating!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the value
customer_reviews.text: Nice spacious picnic bag. I like the insulation because if you spill...you can wipe it up quickly. The plates and flatware are decent....definitely nice to have. This was a great purchase and the value for the money makes this worthy.

customer_reviews.text: Very functional and fully stocked. Just not very stylish in appearance but can't complain.

Great for picnics in the park or for meals on a beach day. I will order more for wedding presents and shower gifts. A nice and unique gift and one that people don't usually expect!

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picnic on the go.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for your picnic!
customer_reviews.text: I received this from my hubby for my birthday because my old one is old and broken. This is definitely an upgrade!! Room for food! Sturdy! No flimsy plates! Real silverware!! Real napkins! And a real cutting board?? Can't wait to take it on a trip!!

customer_reviews.text: The Scuddles insulated picnic bag is bigger than I expected, which is a good thing. It's very well made so I'm sure I will have it for years to come.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picnic set. I haven’t used it yet but I know it will work well. The insulated pocket is actually very spacious.

customer_reviews.title: Did not include salt and pepper shakers
customer_reviews.text: This was as advertised, aside from missing the salt and pepper shakers. It's pretty cheap, but you get what you pay for. The size is good and the interior compartment is roomy.

customer_reviews.title: great gift for picnic lovers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back pack picnic basket as a gift. In talking to my daughter she reports that it is very good quality. It arrived with everything carefully packaged. After using the contents everything went back together easily. She loves it. I am happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like pictured. It is nice and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, and it held the cold much longer than I expected. Due to circumstance, I left the bag in a hot car and while the ice was gone, the drinks were still cool 24 hours later. I live in Colorado - so perhaps, that had an impact.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Loughran

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basket
customer_reviews.text: I like my basket, however you guys need to add a bottom to this basket. Other than that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is really cute and it comes with nice plates and cups. It has a lot of room for snacks and drinks. We love it
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela R

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this picnic basket! It came quickly and is looks exactly as described. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my son and his family. It had an off-putting smell when I first opened it but it went away after I aired it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift so I do not know how well it holds up. It looks very sturdy and has many nice accessories. I am sure it will be well used this summer.
customer_reviews.author: shoppingtillimdropping

customer_reviews.title: Practical bag
customer_reviews.text: A very Practical picnic basket. Although the plates and wine glasses are not as elegant as I expected, but it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: michael w

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gourmet picnic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gourmet picnic. Everything but the food is included! We purchased this as a gift after we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: Nice as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product overall but strongly dislike the "silverware". I did not use it yet so I don't know if it will keep the food warm/cold
customer_reviews.author: Adelina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picnics
customer_reviews.text: We use this for Jazz Fest and visits to the beach every year. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the quality of all the items and the roominess. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...it would make an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: It provided everything I need for my activity. My food was kept warm until it was time to eat. I needed to teplace the plastic glasses and dishes with glass and china, and the elestic was able to stretch to accommodate a larger size and snapped back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked the separate food cooler storage attached to picnic "basket".
customer_reviews.author: silvergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: All you need in a handy bag for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Simon
